POST / HTTP/1.1

<公共请求参数>

        "InstanceId": "cdwch-1vud9x9x",
        "UserName": "admin",
        "PassWord": "base54加密",
        "Describe": "测试用户"

}

CreateBackUpSchedule.document: 创建或者修改备份策略
CreateBackUpSchedule.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwch.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateBackUpSchedule
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdwch-1vud9x9x",
    "ScheduleType": "data",
    "OperationType": "update",
    "BackUpTables": [
        {
            "Database": "default",
            "Table": "customer",
            "Ips": "172.16.4.17",
            "TotalBytes": 1203976330,
            "VCluster": "default_cluster"
        },
        {
            "Database": "default",
            "Table": "lineorder",
            "Ips": "172.16.4.17",
            "TotalBytes": 179936234797,
            "VCluster": "default_cluster"
        }
    ],
    "RetainDays": 7,
    "WeekDays": "2",
    "ExecuteHour": 1,
    "ScheduleId": 4879
}
CreateBackUpSchedule.title: 示例

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwch.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyClusterConfigs
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdwch-vcant3rd",
    "Remark": "修改配置",
    "ModifyConfContext": [
        {
            "FileName": "users.xml",
            "OldConfValue": "",
            "NewConfValue": "",
            "FilePath": "/etc/clickhouse-server"
        }
    ]
}
ModifyClusterConfigs.title: 修改集群配置文件接口

ModifyInstanceKeyValConfigs.title: 示例

ModifyUserNewPrivilege.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwch.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyUserNewPrivilege
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "cdwch-6hxpujog",
    "Cluster": "default_cluster",
    "UserName": "admin12345",
    "AllDatabase": true,
    "GlobalPrivileges": [
        "SELECT",
        "ALTER",
        "INSERT_ALL",
        "CREATE_TABLE",
        "TRUNCATE",
        "DROP_TABLE",
        "DROP_DATABASE",
        "CREATE_DATABASE"
    ],
    "DatabasePrivilegeList": [
        {
            "DatabaseName": "default",
            "DatabasePrivileges": [
                "TRUNCATE",
                "SELECT",
                "INSERT_ALL"
            ],
            "TablePrivilegeList": [
                {
                    "TableName": "trest",
                    "TablePrivileges": [
                        "TRUNCATE",
                        "SELECT",
                        "INSERT_ALL"
                    ]
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
ModifyUserNewPrivilege.title: 新增、修改集群账号权限（新版）
